directions.text: Mix flour, 2 sticks butter sliced, baking powder, salt, and ¼ tsp nutmeg with hands till pea sized.
Press dough into a 9x13 pan and poke with a fork several times, cook for 15 mins.
Make 6 cups of sliced peeled apples
Mix apples with ½ cup sugar, 3 tsp cinnamon and ½ tsp nutmeg.
After dough is cooked reduce oven to 350°
To make topping, mix oats, wheat flour, 1 stick softened butter, 1 cup sugar and 2 tsp cinnamon by hand.
Spread apples on top of shortbread and then topping on top of apples.
